On Escalation Ticket # 00436533 the new comment has been added: Hi Team,

As requested we have followed the steps from there. Surprisingly the OU number was the same.

The solution did not work internal emails still get blocked.

Settings: 
DPI - enabled
Reporting V2 - enabled
We only left 1 single policy active for the user and tested.
Checked Allowlist and CAP Allowlist - looked okay

We have made a recording of the issue:
https://netwrix.zoom.us/rec/share/xujCkGafdreB1ikREBB5AVf-Yc1KpIa3vGP06w-iC6TiNMnzxeoVPBgY75S5F86A.1KtWTyIRdV-XLt0H 
Passcode: %iT0dVzo 

Also please find new logs attached here(New Logs folder):
https://nwxcorp.sharepoint.com/sites/CustomerSupportFiles/Data/00433235

Please advise.

Thank you!
Flaviu

On Escalation Ticket # 00436533 the new comment has been added: Csaba-Janos Polyanki:

Hello,

Instead of @mortonbank.com, @mimecast.com, etc. include the version without the "@".
So mortonbank.com, mimecast.com, etc. 
Also, leave FYDIBOHF25SPDLT there.
This should solve the issue. 
I want to point out that when you include a domain ex. the ones mentioned above, it's important to not include "@". I agree it's cumbersome and prone to error. :)
@WaitingOnEngineer
